item.title: Angular2 HMR with backend server supported
item.description: Currenly I am developing a client + server side boilerplate with Angular 2 and Feathers. For server side, I am using ts-node with nodemon, so far so good. But I find it cumbesome that every time I need to bundle client side code. After some exploring, I find a way to solve the problem. These are the dependencies: angular2-hmr a bootload wrapper on bootstrapModule, it’s cleared classified how to use in github angular2-hmr-loader, a webpack loader to work with the previous one webpack-dev-middleware, just like webpack-dev-server webpack-hot-middleware, an express/feather middleware just like webpack-dev-server w/ hot All of their READMEs clearly walk you through, it just suprises me that few information could be connected on this while it’s a quite general practice in React
